title: Commonsense QA Explanation (ECQA)
description: Annotate explanations for commonsense QA with positive and negative properties. Based on ECQA (Aggarwal et al., ACL 2021). Explain why an answer is correct and why others are wrong.
citation:

    booktitle = "Proceedings of the 59th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics and the 11th International Joint Conference on Natural Language Processing (Volume 1: Long Papers)",
    month = aug,

    pages = "3050--3065"
